product_name: MonkeyLectric M232 Monkey Light Bike Wheel Light
long_description: A fun and highly visible addition to traditional bike lights, the MonkeyLectric M232 Monkey Light bike wheel light brightens up your spinning wheels with fun patterns of complex digital light. 32 LEDs offer bright light and waterproof construction is ready for any kind of weather; choose from 48 different themes with hundreds of color combinations. Light attaches to spokes with vibration-proof 3-point mount and stainless-steel antitheft strap. Up to 25 hr. runtime; requires 3AA batteries not included; batteries are mounted at hub so they don't interfere with the wheels. The MonkeyLectric M232 Monkey Light bike wheel light fits 20 in. and larger bike wheels.
short_description: A fun and highly visible addition to traditional bike lights, the MonkeyLectric M232 Monkey Light bike wheel light brightens up your spinning wheels with fun patterns of complex digital light.
